attributes.action: let the decision stand and not have multiple referendums, until the IN’s win
attributes.additional_details:
What was done to the Irish is a fore taste of what will be done to the British. With Ireland they had no choice as 'everything' depends on Europe, they could be bribed. With Britain they have a better bargaining chip, but with UK Politicians as treacherous as they are, who knows what will happen. 
What happened to Ireland was the time I really knew Democracy had died
(Copy from Yahoo Answers)
attributes.background:
Let my vote stand and don’t brow beat or grind me and others down till you get the result you want.
It worked in Southern Ireland’s IN referendum, it cannot be allowed to happen here.
